choices.C: No action required, this is a standard Customer Service Management feature
choices.B: Major Issue Management needs to be installed and certain properties enabled

choices.A: The advanced plugin (com.sns.pa.customer_service_advanced) needs to be activated

questions.question_text: What is required to synchronize fields from a parent to a child case(s)?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
This should be the correct one
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
Answer: B. Major Issue Management needs to be installed and certain properties enabled

Explanation: "Configure the major issue management system properties to enable synchronization between major cases and associated child cases."

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/config-major-case-synchronization.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: BCE
Answer:
 B. Execute assigned tasks
 C. Close work orders
 E. Manage assets

Explanation: Field Service instance on mobile device in offline mode can:
 - Execute tasks assigned to you at the task location. (b.)
 - View knowledge articles
 - Track asset usage. (e.)
 - Record an incidental expense.
 - Create a work order task.
 - Pause work order tasks.
 - Create a part requirement.
 - Complete work orders and work order tasks. (c.)
 - Log incidentals.
 - Complete questionnaire

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-field-service-management/page/product/field-service-management/concept/work-offline-fieldservice-mobile.html

Selected Answer: BCE
BCE is correct
